unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Get a Festive Boost Ahead of Diwali!**
normalised: home loan schemes get a festive boost ahead of Diwali!

unnormalised: Hey everyone, ready to finally ditch that rental and buy your dream home? Diwali's just around the corner, and banks are rolling out some seriously tempting home loan schemes!
normalised: Hey everyone, ready to finally ditch that rental and buy your dream home? Diwali's just around the corner, and banks are rolling out some seriously tempting home loan schemes!

unnormalised: Think lower interest rates - HDFC and SBI are duking it out with rates starting around 8.5% (subject to terms, of course!). Plus, many are waiving processing fees, saving you a good chunk of change.
normalised: Think lower interest rates - H D F C and S B I are duking it out with rates starting around eight point five percent (subject to terms, of course!). Plus, many are waiving processing fees, saving you a good chunk of change.

unnormalised: Word on the street (er, in the newspaper!) is that Canara Bank is even offering a "Griha Lakshmi" scheme specifically targeting women homebuyers, with potentially better terms. Talk about empowerment!
normalised: Word on the street (er, in the newspaper!) is that Canara Bank is even offering a "Griha Lakshmi" scheme specifically targeting women homebuyers, with potentially better terms. Talk about empowerment!

unnormalised: Remember that apartment complex near Koramangala you’ve been eyeing? Now might be the time!
normalised: Remember that apartment complex near Koramangala you’ve been eyeing? Now might be the time!

unnormalised: But before you get carried away dreaming of biryani in your new kitchen, do your homework! Check the fine print, compare offers, and make sure you can comfortably manage the EMIs. Don’t let that Diwali spirit cloud your financial judgement, okay?
normalised: But before you get carried away dreaming of biryani in your new kitchen, do your homework! Check the fine print, compare offers, and make sure you can comfortably manage the E M I s. Don’t let that Diwali spirit cloud your financial judgement, okay?

unnormalised: It’s a great time to explore, but don't sign on the dotted line before you've spoken to a financial advisor. Happy house hunting!
normalised: It’s a great time to explore, but don't sign on the dotted line before you've spoken to a financial advisor. Happy house hunting!
